players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Diana is mafia, she was silent and had no reason to defend herself."
Diana: "I was silent because I was listening. Bob was innocent and died, so the mafia is still out there. Charlie, if you were mafia, you'd have killed the detective, not me."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed by them."
Charlie: "Alice, you can't be detective if you found me. Bob was a fellow mafia, that's why you killed him. Diana is the real suspect."
You: "I am the detective; I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed by them. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Charlie, you say you killed Bob but that would expose you. Alice's investigation points to you. I'd vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
